snippet: More black and Hispanic male high school students than their white counterparts said they had carried a gun at least once in the previous month, a federal study found.
abstract: More black and Hispanic male high school students than their white counterparts said they had carried a gun at least once in the previous month, a federal study found.

headline.main: Survey on Gun-Carrying Youth Adds Fodder to Stop-and-Frisk Debate

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
